Here are the extracted sentences that meet the criteria:

MYR and DEX showed 50% inhibition of TOPOII alpha enzyme activity (IC 50) at concentrations of 1.18 μm and 52.70 μm, respectively (fig. 13; n=3).
IC50 of MYR and DEX for TOPOII beta enzyme activity was 2.07 μm and 34.43 μm, respectively (FIG. 13; n=3).

As shown in fig. 16, MYR exhibited 2-fold efficacy in protecting DOX-induced cell death over DHM, because the half maximal effective concentrations (EC 50) of MYR and DHM were 7.50 μm and 13.96 μm, respectively.
The concentration of MYR and DHM that reduced the DOX-induced double strand break by 50% (IC 50) was 5.28 μm and 11.30 μm, respectively (fig. 17).
